braf_v600e_associations.relationship: BRAF V600E mutation is present in 8-12% of cases
braf_v600e_associations.evidence: Multiple large cohort studies with consistent findings
braf_v600e_associations.notes: Associated with microsatellite instability and right-sided tumor location

braf_v600e_associations.relationship: BRAF V600E mutation is present in approximately 50% of cases
braf_v600e_associations.evidence: Established biomarker with FDA-approved targeted therapies

braf_v600e_associations.relationship: BRAF V600E mutation occurs in 40-45% of papillary thyroid carcinomas
braf_v600e_associations.evidence: Multiple clinical studies with consistent findings
